title: How to purchase region-change in new client version?
body:
Hey!
I am on EUNE atm, but I really wanna change to EUW so I can play with my friends. 
I've been looking through the store over and over, but I don't seem to find it anywhere. 
Only purchase possible under "account" is the name change thing. 

Anybody??

replies.body: Hey there, transfers recently went offline as we prepare for end of season rewards.  We expect transfers to return in November per the [announcement post.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown)
